content.p: Work with us to bridge the divide between technology and implementation. Together we can build a sustainable future. The SHAping Sustainable Futures hub gives an introduction to the kinds of insights we can offer, but we are always keen to talk to potential partners in the policy space, whether in the UK or elsewhere. If you would like to discuss how we can work with you, please email the Institute. For more information about the Institute for Policy and Engagement, visit our website. Follow us on Twitter Read our blog Listen to our podcast Sign up to our newsletter
